wikipedia_page.main:
Maurice Brooks (1823 – 6 December 1905) was an Irish Home Rule League politician.
He was elected Home Rule Member of Parliament (MP) for Dublin City in 1874, and remained MP until the seat was abolished in 1885.Brooks was Lord Mayor of Dublin for 1874.

response: |rowspan="3"| Maurice BrooksThe Home Rule League was replaced by the Irish Parliamentary Party in 1882.

Maurice Brooks attended Davis and Elkins College and West Virginia Wesleyan College before eventually graduating from West Virginia University (WVU) in 1923. He was also educated at the University of Michigan. He later taught at the University of Virginia and the University of Minnesota.
